vocab


		"key"
			"vibe"

		"public" and "private" key:
			"verifier" and "signer"
			
			private:
				confidence
				secret
			
			public:
				popularity, fame
				society
				landyard
				open
				share
				address
					
		
		"sign"
			sign -> signature
			authorize -> authorization
			approve -> approval
		
		
		"verify"
			authenticate
		
			legitimize
			approve
